name: Roadmap planning brainstorm template
description:
Getting buy-in for your roadmap begins with aligning as a team on a product vision and the most important problems to solve. Gather input from various teams and make sure stakeholders feel heard with a cross-functional brainstorm.


Start by zooming out and considering where you want the company or product to be in the far off future. Then work as a group to identify the problems that stand in the way. Encourage participants to reference research, customer quotes, or any other data that can help the team make a more thoughtful decision. Aim to leave with a strong signal for what work to prioritize as well as potential vision statement that you can work into your formal plans.
